[House of Imaginary Walls](/Feats.aspx?ID=4612) <actions string="" />
</title>

You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real. You learn the [_house of imaginary walls_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1767) [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=559) cantrip.
name: House of Imaginary Walls
